Package: org.gradle.nativebinaries.tasks

[Groovy] Class InstallExecutable

        • org.gradle.nativebinaries.tasks.InstallExecutable

        • Installs an executable with it's dependent libraries so it can be easily executed.

          • Properties Summary

              Properties 
              Type Name and description
              File  destinationDir
              The directory to install files into.
              File  executable
              The executable file to install.
              FileCollection  libs
              The library files that should be installed.
              ToolChain  toolChain
              The tool chain used for linking.

          • Constructor Summary

              Constructors 
              Constructor and description
              InstallExecutable ()

          • Methods Summary

              Methods 
              Type Name and description
              FileOperations getFileOperations()
              FileSystem getFileSystem()
              Instantiator getInstantiator()
              OperatingSystem getOs()
              File getRunScript()
              Returns the script file that can be used to run the install image.
              void install()
              void lib(Object libs)
              Adds a set of library files to be installed.

          • Property Detail

            • @OutputDirectory File destinationDir

              The directory to install files into.

            • @InputFile File executable

              The executable file to install.

            • @InputFiles FileCollection libs

              The library files that should be installed.

            • ToolChain toolChain

              The tool chain used for linking.

          • Constructor Detail

            • @Inject InstallExecutable()

          • Method Detail

            • @Inject FileOperations getFileOperations()

            • @Inject FileSystem getFileSystem()

            • @Inject Instantiator getInstantiator()

            • @Inject OperatingSystem getOs()

            • File getRunScript()

              Returns the script file that can be used to run the install image.

            • @TaskAction void install()

            • void lib(Object libs)

              Adds a set of library files to be installed. The provided libs object is evaluated as per Project.files.
